title: Social Needs Integration
prompt: A weathered kitchen table in a rural home during early morning light, scattered with papers—utility bills, appointment cards, handwritten notes—shot from above at an angle that shows worn wood grain and calloused hands holding a pen. Soft golden light streams through a window in the background, illuminating dust motes. The composition conveys quiet deliberation and the weight of managing multiple life challenges simultaneously, with documentary-style clarity that avoids sentimentality.
